    • Method Detail

      • generateInputstream

        java.io.InputStream generateInputstream()

        generateInputstream

        This method generates an Inputstream containing all information of the classfile, which can be obtained by using the classfile's method "writeTo(OutputStream os)".

        Since:
        27.04.2013
        See Also:
        writeTo(OutputStream)

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(java.io.OutputStream os)

        writeTo

        This method uses an output stream and adds all bytes of the classfile meeting the jvm standard for javabyte classfiles. To do this, it uses the information in its member variables and the writeTo methods of its member objects.

        Parameters:
        os - the output stream to which the bytes are written
        See Also:
        Classfile.ConstantPool.writeTo(java.io.DataOutputStream), Classfile.MethodArea.writeTo(java.io.DataOutputStream)

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()

        getName

        This method returns the classfile's name.

        Since:
        27.04.2013

      • addLongConstantToConstantPool

        short addLongConstantToConstantPool(long value)

        addLongConstantToConstantPool

        This method creates an longInfo-entry meeting the jvm classfile constant pool CONSTANT_LONG_info standard in the constantPool of this classfile. The generated entry is appended to the existing list, if it is not already in it. The entry's index is returned.

        Parameters:
        value - long value of the value which is to be generated
        Returns:
        short index of a long info entry in the constant pool of this classfile meeting the parameters.
        Since:
        26.05.2013

      • addDoubleConstantToConstantPool

        short addDoubleConstantToConstantPool(double value)

        addDoubleConstantToConstantPool

        This method creates an doubleInfo-entry meeting the jvm classfile constant pool CONSTANT_DOUBLE_info standard in the constantPool of this classfile. The generated entry is appended to the existing list, if it is not already in it. The entry's index is returned.

        Parameters:
        value - double value of the value which is to be generated
        Returns:
        short index of a double info entry in the constant pool of this classfile meeting the parameters.
        Since:
        26.05.2013

        short addStringConstantToConstantPool(java.lang.String value)

        addStringConstantToConstantPool

        This method creates an stringInfo-entry meeting the jvm classfile constant pool CONSTANT_STRING_info standard in the constantPool of this classfile. The generated entry is appended to the existing list, if it is not already in it. The entry's index is returned.

        Parameters:
        value - string value of the value which is to be generated

      • addClassConstantToConstantPool

        short addClassConstantToConstantPool(java.lang.String value)

        addClassConstantToConstantPool

        This method creates an classInfo-entry meeting the jvm classfile constant pool CONSTANT_CLASS_info standard in the constantPool of this classfile. The generated entry is appended to the existing list, if it is not already in it. The entry's index is returned.

        Parameters:
        value - string value of the value which is to be generated
        Returns:
        short index of a class info entry in the constant pool of this classfile meeting the parameters.
        Since:
        26.05.2013

      • addMethodrefConstantToConstantPool

        short addMethodrefConstantToConstantPool(java.lang.String methodName,
                                       java.lang.String methodNameDescriptor,
                                       java.lang.String classNameEIF)

        addMethodrefConstantToConstantPool

        This method creates an methodrefInfo-entry meeting the jvm classfile constant pool CONSTANT_Methodref_info standard in the constantPool of this classfile. The generated entry is appended to the existing list, if it is not already in it. The entry's index is returned. Therefore this method adds all necessary data to the constant pool needed to call the defined method via the instruction invokestatic.

        Parameters:
        methodName - string name of the method
        methodNameDescriptor - string method descriptor as specified by the jvm specification
        classNameEIF - string describing the method's class' class name encoded in internal form according to the jvm specification
        Returns:
        short index of a methodref info entry in the constant pool of this classfile meeting the parameters.
        Since:
        13.05.2013

      • addFieldrefConstantToConstantPool

        short addFieldrefConstantToConstantPool(java.lang.String fieldName,
                                      java.lang.String fieldNameDescriptor,
                                      java.lang.String classNameEIF)

        addFieldrefConstantToConstantPool

        This method creates a fieldrefInfo-entry meeting the jvm classfile constant pool CONSTANT_Fieldref_info standard in the constantPool of this classfile. The generated entry is appended to the existing list, if it is not already in it. The entry's index is returned. Therefore this method adds all necessary data to the constant pool needed to get data from another class via the instruction getstatic.

        Parameters:
        fieldName - string name of the field
        fieldNameDescriptor - string field descriptor as specified by the jvm specification
        classNameEIF - string describing the method's class' class name encoded in internal form according to the jvm specification
        Returns:
        short index of a fieldref info entry in the constant pool of this classfile meeting the parameters.
        Since:
        30.05.2013

      • getIndexOfConstantInConstantPool

        short getIndexOfConstantInConstantPool(IClassfile.InfoTag constantType,
                                     java.lang.String constantName)

        getIndexOfConstantInConstantPool

        This method looks up the index of a constant in the constant pool of this classfile.

        The constant name (key) must be in an appropriate format:
        LONG - {long value}
        DOUBLE - {double value}
        STRING - {string value}
        CLASS - {class description}
        UTF8 - {utf8 value}
        Methodref - {class index}.{nameAndType index}
        NameAndType - {method name}{method descriptor}

        Parameters:
        constantType - InfoTag type of the constant
        constantName - String name of the constant
        Returns:
        index of the constant in the constant pool of this classfile.
        Since:
        30.04.2013

      • addMethodToMethodArea

        void addMethodToMethodArea(java.lang.String methodName,
                         java.lang.String methodDescriptor,
                         IClassfile.MethodAccessFlag... accessFlags)

        addMethodToMethodArea

        This method calls the addMethod method of the classfile's method area to add and initialize a new method.

        Parameters:
        methodName - String name of the method
        methodDescriptor - String method descriptor as specified by jvm specification
        accessFlags - arbitrary amount of method access flags
        Since:
        29.04.2013

      • addVariableToMethodsCode

        void addVariableToMethodsCode(java.lang.String methodName,
                            java.lang.String variableName,
                            IClassfile.VariableType variableType)

        addVariableToMethodsCode

        This method adds a new variable to a methods code by allocating appropriate space in the local variable table of the method.

        Parameters:
        methodName - String name of the method
        variableName - String name of the variable
        variableType - VariableType variable type of the variable
        Since:
        29.04.2013

      • addLongVariableToMethodsCode

        void addLongVariableToMethodsCode(java.lang.String methodName,
                                java.lang.String variableName)

        addLongVariableToMethodsCode

        This method adds explicitly a LONG variable to a methods code using the Classfile method addVariableToMethodsCode with an appropriate variable type.

        Parameters:
        methodName - String name of the method
        variableName - String name of the variable
        Since:
        25.05.2013
        See Also:
        addVariableToMethodsCode(String, String, VariableType)

      • getIndexOfVariableInMethod

        byte getIndexOfVariableInMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                              java.lang.String variableName)

        getIndexOfVariableInMethod

        This method looks up the index of a variable in the local variable space of the code attribute of the specified method and returns it.

        Parameters:
        methodName - String name of the method
        variableName - String name of the variable
        Returns:
        index of the variable in local variable space of the code attribute of the specified method. variable space has a size of 1 byte
        Since:
        30.04.2013

      • addInstructionToMethodsCode

        void addInstructionToMethodsCode(java.lang.String methodName,
                               Instruction instruction)

        addInstructionToMethodsCode

        This method adds a new Instruction to the code area of the code attribute of the provided method of the method area of this classfile using the method Classfile.MethodArea.addInstructionToMethodsCode(String, Instruction) .

        Parameters:
        methodName - String name of the method
        instruction - instance of class Instruction
        Since:
        30.04.2013
        See Also:
        Classfile.MethodArea, Classfile.MethodArea.addInstructionToMethodsCode(String, Instruction), Instruction

      • addInstructionsToMethodsCode

        void addInstructionsToMethodsCode(java.lang.String methodName,
                                java.util.Collection<Instruction> instructions)

        addInstructionsToMethodsCode

        This method adds new Instructions to the code area of the code attribute of the provided method of the method area of this classfile using the Classfile method addInstructionToMethodsCode.

        Parameters:
        methodName - String name of the method
        instructions - Collection of instances of class Instruction
        Since:
        09.05.2013
        See Also:
        Classfile.addInstructionToMethodsCode(String, Instruction)
